New Records: Shohei Ohtani hit his 44th home run of the season
Mookie Betts hit his 14th home run of the season
Freddie Freeman hit his 19th home run of the season
This was the first time that three Dodgers players hit home runs consecutively in the team's 141-year history
Key Match Events: Corbin Carroll hit an inside-the-park leadoff home run for Arizona
Ben Casparius (1-0), in his major league debut, pitched a scoreless eighth for the Dodgers' fourth straight victory
Evans Phillips retired the side in order in the ninth for his 18th save
Pre-Game Insights: No pre-game insights were provided in the article
Post-Match Reflections: No post-match reflections were provided in the article
Miscellaneous Highlights: Lourdes Gurriel Jr. homered and drove in three runs for the Diamondbacks
Will Smith and Gavin Lux singled off Ryan Thompson (7-4) to start the ninth inning
Kiké Hernández sacrificed the runners to second and third and Edman looped a hit into shallow right field against Justin Martinez to score pinch runner Chris Taylor and Lux
Others: The Dodgers placed LHP Clayton Kershaw on the 15-day injured list. Reliever Joe Kelly also went on the injured list with right shoulder inflammation. To replace them, the Dodgers recalled right-handers Brent Honeywell and Ben Casparius from Triple-A Oklahoma City
Another injured starter, Tyler Glasnow, expressed optimism before the game about returning to the Dodgers rotation before the end of the season
